metadata.title: CVE-2018-15501 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In ng_pkt in transports/smart_pkt.c in libgit2 before 0.26.6 and 0.27.xbefore 0.27.4, a remote attacker can send a crafted smart-protocol "ng"packet that lacks a '\0' byte to trigger an out-of-bounds read that leadsto DoS.

criterions.comment: libgit2 package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
